name: Analytical Thinking
definition: The ability to break down complex situations, spot patterns across seemingly unrelated information, and identify the root issues that matter most.

name: Achievement Focus
definition: Taking ownership of outcomes and driving toward results. This means setting meaningful goals, working efficiently within constraints, and seizing opportunities when they arise.

name: Written Communication
definition: Expressing ideas clearly in writing, adapting tone and complexity for different audiences, and ensuring your message lands the way you intend it to.

name: Adaptive Thinking
definition: Adjusting your approach when circumstances change. This includes embracing different perspectives, pivoting when needed, and staying effective in ambiguous situations.

name: Resource Management
definition: Understanding what people, money, and operational capacity you have available—and making smart decisions about how to deploy them for maximum impact.

name: Team Collaboration
definition: Working effectively with others toward shared goals. At higher levels, this includes leading teams, building trust across groups, and creating environments where people do their best work.

name: Client Orientation
definition: Understanding what your stakeholders actually need (not just what they ask for), anticipating their concerns, and delivering solutions that genuinely help them.

name: Interpersonal Awareness
definition: Reading people accurately—hearing what's said and unsaid, understanding motivations, and navigating cultural differences with sensitivity. Includes managing your own reactions under pressure.

name: Persuasion
definition: Moving people toward your position through honest, respectful means. This involves understanding what others care about and framing your ideas in ways that resonate with them.

name: Negotiation
definition: Working toward outcomes where everyone walks away with something. This ranges from basic give-and-take to orchestrating complex multi-party agreements.

name: Organizational Savvy
definition: Understanding how power and decisions actually flow in organizations—who influences whom, what the unwritten rules are, and how to navigate formal and informal structures effectively.

name: Talent Development
definition: Creating conditions for people to grow. This includes sharing knowledge, giving useful feedback, delegating meaningfully, and building environments where learning happens naturally.

name: Mission Alignment
definition: Connecting your work to larger organizational goals and acting in ways that advance the collective mission, even when it means deprioritizing personal preferences.

name: Relationship Building
definition: Cultivating and maintaining connections with people who matter for long-term success—inside and outside your organization. Real relationships, not just transactional contacts.

name: Strategic Thinking
definition: Seeing the big picture—how trends, opportunities, threats, and resources connect. This means linking daily decisions to long-term direction and helping others see that connection too.
